params.tokensToBurn: The number of tokens to burn

params.comment: A comment associated with the buy order
params.expectedMarketType: The expected market type (0 = BONDING_CURVE, 1 = UNISWAP_POOL)
params.minOrderSize: The minimum size of the order to prevent slippage
params.recipient: The address to receive the purchased tokens
params.refundRecipient: The address to receive any excess ETH
params.sqrtPriceLimitX96: The price limit for Uniswap V3 pool swaps

returns._0: The number of tokens that can be bought
The amount of ETH that can be received

params._bondingCurve: The address of the bonding curve module
params._convictionNFT: The address of the conviction NFT contract

params.comment: A comment associated with the sell order
params.expectedMarketType: The expected market type (0 = BONDING_CURVE, 1 = UNISWAP_POOL)
params.minPayoutSize: The minimum payout size to prevent slippage
params.recipient: The address to receive the ETH payout
params.sqrtPriceLimitX96: The price limit for Uniswap V3 pool swaps
params.tokensToSell: The number of tokens to sell

burn(uint256).notice: Allows a holder to burn their tokens after the market has graduated

buy(address,address,string,uint8,uint256.notice: Buys tokens from the bonding curve or Uniswap V3 pool depending on the market state.

convictionNFT().notice: Returns the address of the Conviction NFT contract

getCurrentPrice().notice: Returns the current price from Uniswap pool or 0 if in bonding curve

getEthBuyQuote(uint256).notice: Provides a quote for buying tokens with a given amount of ETH

getTokenSellQuote(uint256).notice: Provides a quote for selling a given number of tokens

name().notice: Returns the name of the token

sell(uint256,address,string,uint8,uint25.notice: Sells tokens to the bonding curve or Uniswap V3 pool depending on the market state

state().notice: Returns the current state of the market

tokenURI().notice: Returns the URI of the token
